title: Number of people freelancing in U.S. 2014 to 2019
yAxis: Number of people doing freelance work in million
summary: In general Number of people doing freelance work in million has stayed the same over the Year.
Number of people doing freelance work in million is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
The highest Number of people doing freelance work in million, of value 57.3 was reached at Year 2017
Minimum Number of people doing freelance work in million about 55.0 was reached at Year 2016
min_summary: Overall Number of people doing freelance work in million has increased over the Year.
Number of people doing freelance work in million is slightly increasing from 2016 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
